aboutme: I am Computer Science Graduate(2016-2020 batch) from Malaviya National Institute of Technology(MNIT, Jaipur), India. Currently I am working as Full Stack Developer for Oracle Financial Services Software(OFSS), India.

I am a fast learner and do faster development. I can(did) handle multiple tasks under pressure by help of my organised working. The good thing - which my team members always appreciate for :),  is my perfection in task finishing and development which is very less pron to bugs. I have worked on many technologies like Microservices with SpringBoot, Flexible RESTful APIs, DevOps, Natural Language Processing, Deep Learning etc.
I belong to Jhunjhunu(Rajasthan) from where I completed my primary, secondary and senior secondary education.

workexp: Maintaining the service provided to applications on Docker and Kubernetes.
Dealing with job scheduling service for different applications at the same time, ensuring product's stability.

Designed a few rich User Interfaces using OJET and refined the existing UI's to more rich and user friendly. The major difficulty was to make these UI faster and robust, which I successfully accompolished in very less span of time.
Developed a user-friendly multi-label text classification web application in using NLP and Oracle JavaScript Extension Toolkit(OJET).
Worked on Image preprocessing and Computer Vision for Real time Person identification and action recognition.
Developed an Python GUI based attendence system by using conventional image processing methods for face detection and recognition.
Worked on different time series forecasting methods(ARIMA, SARIMA, Prophet etc.) for sales forecasting.
